1. This HP 15.6" Touchscreen Laptop (64GB RAM, 2TB SSD, i7) Drops $2,600 on Amazon to an All-Time Low  Gizmodo
  2. Amazon is selling a $2,200 touchscreen laptop for $860, and shoppers say it's 'sleek, affordable, and reliable'  TheStreet
  3. Amazon Is Selling a 'Lightweight' $1,080 HP Laptop for Just $330, and Shoppers Say It's 'Perfect for Everyday Use'  parade.com
  4. Amazon is selling a $1,600 laptop for $387, and shoppers say 'it feels way more expensive than it is'  Yahoo
  5. This Lenovo Laptop (15.6", 32GB RAM, 1TB Storage) Is Now 73% Off, Amazon Is Selling It at a Loss  Gizmodo
